MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA18 and DG3 postcode areas of Sanquhar, Kirkconnell and Dumfries. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:08pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigation work required on our network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:09pm on 8th January 2021.
